content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I have a budget of 300 Euros per month for the apartment. What is your offer?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I understand that you have a budget of 300 Euros per month for the apartment. However, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I will need to see if that is possible within your budget. What are the specific features of the apartment that you are interested in?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am interested in the location, the size, and the amenities. If the apartment is in a good location, has a decent size, and has basic amenities, I am willing to pay more for it.

I am willing to pay up to 350 Euros per month for the apartment if it meets my requirements.

What is your offer?

Please note that I am a student and I am dependable and responsible, so I am open to negotiating the rental price.

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,

Juan Mamani
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content:
Thank you for your offer, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to pay more for an apartment that meets your requirements. However, I am afraid that I am not able to accept your offer of 350 Euros per month. The apartment is quite small, at only 25 square meters, and does not come with any additional amenities beyond the basic necessities.

I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a higher rental price in exchange for a more luxurious living space and additional amenities. I believe that my apartment would be a good fit for you if you are willing to pay a little more for it.

That being said, I am open to negotiating the rental price with you. What is your budget for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine
